Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidField error is raised during the encoding of a
        Register request payload when the payload is missing the managed
        object.
        """
payload = payloads.RegisterRequestPayload(object_type=enums.ObjectType.
    SECRET_DATA, template_attribute=objects.TemplateAttribute(attributes=[
    objects.Attribute(attribute_name=objects.Attribute.AttributeName(
    'Cryptographic Usage Mask'), attribute_value=primitives.Integer(enums.
    CryptographicUsageMask.VERIFY.value, tag=enums.Tags.
    CRYPTOGRAPHIC_USAGE_MASK))]))
args = utils.BytearrayStream(),
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'The Register request payload is missing the managed object field.',
    payload.write, *args)
